00061 #define OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE                            0x01
00062 #define OBJECT_MODIFIED                               0x02
00063 #define OBJECT_AI_UNUSABLE                            0x04
00064 #define OBJECT_ARMED_BOMB                             0x08
00065 #define OBJECT_KNOWN_TO_BE_TRAPPED              0x10
00066 #define OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB                    0x20
00067 #define OBJECT_ALARM_TRIGGER                    0x40
00068 #define OBJECT_NO_OVERWRITE                           0x80
00069 
00070 #define GS_CARTRIDGE_IN_CHAMBER                       0x01
00071 
00072 typedef struct
00073 {
00074       UINT16      usItem;
00075       UINT8       ubNumberOfObjects;
00076       union
00077       {
00078             struct
00079             {
00080                   INT8        bGunStatus;             // status % of gun
00081                   UINT8       ubGunAmmoType;    // ammo type, as per weapons.h
00082                   UINT8       ubGunShotsLeft;   // duh, amount of ammo left
00083                   UINT16            usGunAmmoItem;    // the item # for the item table
00084                   INT8        bGunAmmoStatus; // only for "attached ammo" - grenades, mortar shells
00085                   UINT8       ubGunState; // SB manual recharge
00086                   UINT8       ubGunUnused[MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT - 6];
00087             };
00088             struct
00089             {
00090                   UINT8       ubShotsLeft[MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT];
00091             };
00092             struct
00093             {
00094                   INT8        bStatus[MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT];
00095             };          
00096             struct
00097             {
00098                   INT8        bMoneyStatus;
00099                   UINT32      uiMoneyAmount;
00100                   UINT8       ubMoneyUnused[MAX_OBJECTS_PER_SLOT - 5];
00101             };
00102             struct
00103             { // this is used by placed bombs, switches, and the action item
00104                   INT8        bBombStatus;                  // % status
00105                   INT8        bDetonatorType;         // timed, remote, or pressure-activated
00106                   UINT16      usBombItem;                   // the usItem of the bomb.
00107                   union
00108                   {
00109                         struct
00110                         {
00111                               INT8        bDelay;                       // >=0 values used only
00112                         };
00113                         struct
00114                         {
00115                               INT8        bFrequency;       // >=0 values used only
00116                         };
00117                   };
00118                   UINT8 ubBombOwner; // side which placed the bomb
00119                   UINT8 bActionValue;// this is used by the ACTION_ITEM fake item
00120                   union
00121                   {
00122                         struct
00123                         {
00124                               UINT8 ubTolerance; // tolerance value for panic triggers
00125                         };
00126                         struct 
00127                         {
00128                               UINT8 ubLocationID; // location value for remote non-bomb (special!) triggers
00129                         };
00130                   };          
00131             };
00132             struct
00133             {
00134                   INT8 bKeyStatus[ 6 ];
00135                   UINT8 ubKeyID;
00136                   UINT8 ubKeyUnused[1];
00137             };
00138             struct
00139             {
00140                   UINT8 ubOwnerProfile;
00141                   UINT8 ubOwnerCivGroup;
00142                   UINT8 ubOwnershipUnused[6];
00143             };
00144       };
00145   // attached objects
00146       UINT16      usAttachItem[MAX_ATTACHMENTS];
00147       INT8        bAttachStatus[MAX_ATTACHMENTS];
00148 
00149       INT8        fFlags;
00150       UINT8       ubMission;
00151       INT8        bTrap;        // 1-10 exp_lvl to detect
00152       UINT8       ubImprintID;      // ID of merc that item is imprinted on
00153       UINT8       ubWeight;
00154       UINT8       fUsed;                        // flags for whether the item is used or not
00155 } OBJECTTYPE;
